title: Add Music page and front page preview for Synthetic Agondonters Collective

requirements.text: Create a standalone Music page (`/music` route) that showcases the Synthetic Agondonters Collective. The page should display a curated grid of track cards, each showing a track title, a short description or genre tag, and a link that opens the corresponding Suno track at https://suno.com/@nebacrypt in a new tab. The layout must be responsive for both mobile and desktop, and must match the existing site's Nordic-themed design (colors, typography, component patterns from index.css and Tailwind config).

quotes: track cards is perfect. no distinct look, just functional ui for mobile and desktop

acceptanceCriteria: A `/music` route renders the Music page without errors
Track cards display title, a descriptive tag, and an outbound link to the Suno profile/track
Clicking a track card link opens https://suno.com/@nebacrypt in a new tab
Page layout is usable and well-structured on mobile (< 768px) and desktop (≥ 1024px)
Visual style (colors, fonts, spacing) is consistent with the rest of the site

requirements.text: Add a compact preview section for the Synthetic Agondonters Collective on the existing Landing page (`LandingPage.tsx`). This section should display 2–3 highlighted track cards (same card design as the full Music page) and include a prominent 'See all music' call-to-action link that navigates to the `/music` page. The section should be placed in a logical position on the landing page (e.g., after the services section) and must be fully responsive.

quotes: just feature a preview with a link to the full page

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page contains a clearly identifiable music preview section
Section displays 2–3 track cards using the same component/design as the full Music page
A 'See all music' link is visible and navigates to the `/music` route
Section is responsive on both mobile and desktop
Section integrates visually with the existing LandingPage layout

requirements.text: Register the new Music page in the application router (`App.tsx`) so that navigating to `/music` renders the Music page. Add a 'Music' navigation link to the site header (`Header.tsx`) for both desktop and mobile menus, pointing to the `/music` route.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to `/music` loads the Music page
Desktop header contains a 'Music' nav link
Mobile hamburger menu contains a 'Music' nav link
Active state styling is applied to the Music nav link when on the `/music` route

constraints: Do not use any Suno embed iframes or external scripts — only outbound links to https://suno.com/@nebacrypt
All track data must be hardcoded on the frontend (no backend changes needed)
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Visual style must match the existing Nordic-themed design defined in index.css and tailwind.config.js
nonGoals: No Suno API integration or dynamic fetching of tracks
No backend changes or new Motoko endpoints
No distinct visual theme separate from the existing site design
